3. **DogFest** (available via Pets‚ÄëLifestyle)

   - Also offers *Superfood Training Treats* such as Quail & Chia seeds and Turkey & Flax seeds, delivering functional health benefits‚Äîomega fatty acids, antioxidants, digestive and skin support‚Äîwith no artificial additives ([pets-lifestyle.com](https://www.pets-lifestyle.com/collections/dog-treats?utm_source=openai)).

4. **The Barkery by NV** (available through The Pet Belly)  
   - Focuses on functional wellness treats made with human‚Äëgrade, natural ingredients.  
   - Examples include *Strong Bones Bites* (with paneer, eggshell, sesame for bone and joint strength) and *Immunity Boost Bites* (packed with sweet potato, flaxseed, turmeric for immune support) ([thepetbelly.com](https://thepetbelly.com/collections/top-selling-products?utm_source=openai)).  
   - These are ideal for puppies in growth and developmental stages.

5. **Licks &‚ÄØCrunch**  
   - A relatively recent (founded 2020) Indian brand offering **grain‚Äëfree, gluten‚Äëfree, preservative‚Äëfree gourmet treats** infused with carefully researched Indian herbs and spices ([thebetterindia.com](https://thebetterindia.com/287979/healthy-pet-treats-brands-buy-natural-organic-dog-cat-food-amazon/amp?utm_source=openai)).  
   - Made with nutrition and flavor in mind, geared for health‚Äëconscious pet owners.

6. **BARF India**  
   - Promotes a holistic, evolutionary ("BARF" ‚Äì Biologically Appropriate Raw Food) approach with *natural dehydrated jerkies*, raw meat mixes with fruits and vegetables, offered without grains, fillers, or artificial additives ([thebetterindia.com](https://thebetterindia.com/287979/healthy-pet-treats-brands-buy-natural-organic-dog-cat-food-amazon/amp?utm_source=openai)).

**Tips when selecting healthy puppy treats**:

- **Check ingredient lists**: Avoid artificial colors, preservatives, added sugars, excess salt, or harmful ingredients like onion/garlic. Opt for single‚Äëingredient or minimally processed treats ([fureverkare.com](https://fureverkare.com/collections/pet-treats?utm_source=openai)).
- **Match your puppy‚Äôs age and needs**: Soft, bite‚Äësize treats are best for small mouths and teething puppies (e.g. Dogsee Mini‚ÄëPops, DogFest sticks).
- **Check dietary sensitivities**: For allergies or sensitivities, choose hypoallergenic options (e.g. DogFest Rabbit Ears, Licks & Crunch, BARF India‚Äôs grain‚Äëfree varieties).
- **Use treats for training‚Äîmoderately**: Treats should make up no more than ~10% of daily calorie intake to avoid obesity or nutritional imbalances ([fureverkare.com](https://fureverkare.com/collections/pet-treats?utm_source=openai)).

([dogseechew.in](https://www.dogseechew.in/blog/4-natural-nutritious-dog-treats-to-keep-your-pet-healthy?utm_source=openai))
